name: Water
description: Essential for life and a source of Hydrogen/Oxygen.

name: Dirt
description: Common soil containing trace minerals.

name: Wood
description: Organic matter, rich in Carbon.

name: Spodumene
description: Lithium-rich pyroxene mineral found in pegmatites.

name: Quartz Cluster
description: Crystalline Silicon dioxide. Source of Silicon.

name: Malachite Ore
description: Copper carbonate hydroxide mineral. Source of Copper.

name: Hydrogen
description: The most abundant element in the universe. Essential fuel.

name: Helium
description: Inert gas used for cooling and pressurization.

name: Lithium
description: Lightweight metal used in advanced batteries.

name: Beryllium
description: Strong, lightweight metal used in aerospace.

name: Boron
description: Used in dopants for semiconductors.

name: Carbon
description: The basis of life and organic chemistry.

name: Nitrogen
description: Abundant gas, essential for life support systems.

name: Oxygen
description: Crucial for breathing and combustion.

name: Silicon
description: Used in electronics and glass making.

name: Germanium
description: Semiconductor material used in advanced electronics.

name: Iron
description: Strong metal widely used in construction.

name: Semiconductor
description: Germanium-doped Silicon wafer for high-speed logic.

name: Advanced Circuitry
description: High-performance integrated circuits.

name: Microchip
description: Miniaturized semiconductor logic unit.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Hardened alloy of Iron and Carbon.

name: Graphite Plate
description: Compressed carbon used in heat shields and electronics.

name: Metal Scrap
description: Mangled parts from destroyed machines. Can be recycled.

name: Copper
description: Excellent conductor for electronics and energy weapons.

name: Gold
description: Highly conductive precious metal used in advanced circuitry.

name: Titanium
description: High-strength, low-density metal for advanced hulls.

name: Tungsten
description: Extremely hard and dense metal. Ideal for armor penetration.

name: Encrypted Nav-Data
description: Encrypted coordinates to unknown sectors.

name: Hydraulic Servo
description: High-power mechanical actuators.

name: Basic Circuitry
description: Integrated circuits required for automation and logic.

name: Nanoweave Mesh
description: Carbon nanotube mesh. Repairs 50 Shield Integrity.

name: Hull Sealant
description: Rapid-hardening polymer. Repairs 50 Hull Integrity.

name: Carbon Fiber
description: Reinforced carbon strands used in advanced fabrication.

name: Polymer Resin
description: Synthetic resin base for sealants and plastics.

name: Helium Coolant Cell
description: Pressurized helium cooling unit for high-power weapons.

name: Ferrite Rounds
description: Standard iron slugs. +5 Kinetic Dmg (20s).

name: Tungsten Sabot
description: Armor-piercing heavy slugs. +15 Kinetic Dmg (20s).

name: Focus Crystal
description: Lenses for beam cohesion. +5 Energy Dmg (20s).

name: Plasma Cell
description: Superheated gas canister. +15 Energy Dmg (20s).

name: Uranium
description: Heavy radioactive metal. Very dense. Handle with care.

name: Depleted Uranium Round
description: Self-sharpening penetrator. +30 Kinetic Dmg (20s).

name: Vaporizer Cell
description: Unstable singularity core. +30 Energy Dmg (20s).

name: LaserSight
description: Improves targeting accuracy.

name: Kinetic Shells
description: Mass-produced kinetic ammunition. +25 Kinetic Dmg.

name: Energy Cells
description: Standardized energy batteries. +25 Energy Dmg.

name: HE Missiles
description: High-Explosive ordinance. +50 Kinetic / +20 Energy Dmg.

name: Void Artifact
description: Anomalous object reacting to zero-point energy. Required for Capital Ships.

name: Quantum Core
description: Stable quantum singularity. The heart of a Dreadnought.

name: Ancient Component
description: Unidentifiable machinery from a lost civilization. Highly valuable.

name: Tungsten Slug
description: Heavy kinetic rounds. (+2 Kinetic Dmg)

name: Depleted Uranium Slug
description: Advanced kinetic rounds. (+5 Kinetic Dmg)

name: Power Cell
description: Standard energy battery. (+0 Bonus)

name: Plasma Cell
description: High-capacity energy cell. (+2 Energy Dmg)

name: Antimatter Cell
description: Unstable energy source. (+5 Energy Dmg)

name: Basic Battery
description: Standard energy storage unit for early ships.

name: Graphene Matrix Battery
description: High-density advanced energy storage.

name: Zero-Point Module
description: Infinite energy extraction from the void (Sort of).

name: Common Research Artifact
description: Salvaged data core containing basic engineering schematics.

name: Drone Core
description: Intact processing unit from a destroyed drone. Required for circuit fabrication.

name: Salvage Data
description: Technical schematics recovered from derelict probes. Essential for engineering research.

name: Pirate Manifest
description: Encrypted cargo logs revealing hidden sector coordinates.

name: Rare Research Artifact
description: Advanced technical schematics from Martian ruins. Required for mid-game research.

name: Exotic Research Artifact
description: Xenon technology data cores. Essential for capital ship engineering.

name: Colony Salvage
description: Dense clusters of tech from failed colonies. High in rare metals.

name: Radioactive Isotope
description: Highly unstable isotope harvested from nebulae. Essential for gamma tech.
